name: Early Metrics
slogan: Rating agency for startups and innovative SMEs
description:
Early Metrics is the international rating agency for startups and innovative SMEs. We provide corporates and investors with qualitative and financial insights to decide which ventures to partner with or invest in. Our scientific methodology focuses on qualitative KPIs to reliably assess the growth potential of any tech start-up or scale-up. With offices in London, Paris, Berlin and Tel Aviv as well as a database of 2000+ rated startups, Early Metrics provides its Fortune 500 clients and investors with transparent and independent knowledge into the most dynamic startup ecosystems. 

Start-ups also benefit from being rated by Early Metrics as they freely receive a rating certificate and feedback from expert analysts. 

Early Metrics is the bridge between the most forward-thinking decision makers and the most innovative newcomers.

team.name: Antoine Baschiera
team.bioHtml: After challenging experiences at L'Oreal and PwC, I am currently fully dedicated to Early Metrics, the first rating agency for start up companies.

team.name: Sébastien Paillet
team.bioHtml: Co-founder @Early Metrics - the the first rating agency for startups and SME’s. Alumni @PwC

team.title: US Expansion manager
team.name: Maria Mossadek
team.bioHtml: Professional with strong interest in business development, strategy & startups. Dual European American citizenship.

team.title: Business Developerin DACH
team.name: Celia Geering
team.bioHtml: Working at Early Metrics. Graduated with my Masters from Hult International Business School.

jobs.title: Account Manager - DACH
jobs.description:
Role and Responsibility:

Imagine knowing which Trends and Startups will shape our daily life 10 years in advance?

As an Account Manager, you will become the « Innovation-person » for our Client Portfolio, understanding their needs, work closely with our Analysts and position the perfect solutions to our Clients needs. You will become their Partner, their friend, the person they trust because you will understand their needs, listen and strategize. 

Directly attached to the Head of Sales - DACH, you will :
- Develop and deploy your Account Management Strategy for Fortune 500 and well-known Mittelstand companies
- Nurture the relationships with our key Clients
- Build Trust and become that person everybody is talking about when our clients think of startups/Strategy and Innovation
- Push new ways of supporting our Clients, new products and new solutions because they trust you
- Support us in growing the family of Early Metrics?

What’s it in for you other than a salary?
- Enhance your skills, on-going personal development through senior and peer support
- Develop your knowledge, expertise and network in the startup and venture ecosystem
- Work with very smart and highly motivated people
- Have direct impact on the development of the company.


Who you are?
- You have a Master degree in one of the top International universities/schools
- You also have minimum 2 years of experience in consulting or Sales & business development with results showing your ability to develop and manage high margin businesses
- You ideally have overseas experience and understanding of different cultures
- Finally, you are fluent in English and German Native.


You also are:
- A-Level player, committed and getting things done
- Empathetic: We are a Family and care about each other and our clients
- Professional and autonomous, but also open for for plenty of fun and team activities
- International experience and open mindset
- You wake up with a smile because you love life and what you will be doing
- Optimistic and curious.


If you think you’re a good match, get in touch:  http://bit.do/ePLmT !

jobs.title: Business Developer - DACH
jobs.description:
PASSIONATE ABOUT INNOVATION AND THE STARTUP ECOSYSTEM?

Role and Responsibility:
Directly reporting to the Head of Sales - DACH. As a Business Developer you will be responsible for Early Metrics development in the UK which includes:
- Embracing opportunity and taking responsibility from day one
- Directly effect the pace of our growth
- Enter the venture ecosystem in an international company with a unique position
- Create, manage and close your own deals with Fortune 500 organisations and make them embrace Early Metrics services
- Develop and deploy your own prospection strategy
- Close deals with Fortune 500 organisations and investors
- Become our clients trusted partner in their Innovation Strategy
- Represent the company during events and conferences
- Participate in providing and delivering on projects in continuous company development
- Support us in growing the family of Early Metrics.

What’s it in for you other than salary?
- Enhance your skills, on-going personal development through senior and peer support
- Develop your knowledge, expertise and network in the startup and venture ecosystem
- Work with very smart and highly motivated people
- Have direct impact on the development of the company.


Who you are?
- You have a Master degree in one of the top International universities/schools
- You also have a previous experience in sales and/or business development, consulting, with results showing your ability to develop and manage high margin businesses
- You ideally have overseas experience and understanding of different cultures
- Finally, you are fluent in English and German Native.


You also are:
- A-Level player, committed and getting things done
- Empathetic: We are a Family and care about each other and our clients
- Professional and autonomous, but also open for plenty of fun and team activities
- International experience and open mindset
- You wake up with a smile because you love life and what you will be doing
- Optimistic and curious.
